name: Abnormal Endurance
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor_text: Tenacity prevails when hopes die.

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

name: Angel of the Dawn
oracle_text:
Flying
When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

name: Anticipate
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Divining the future is easy when you hold the power to sway it.

name: Aven Wind Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "My skill sharpens with each beat of my wings."

name: Aviation Pioneer
oracle_text: When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "They say perfection is unattainable, but they said that about flight too."

name: Befuddle
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "The trick to talking sense into Keldons is getting them to hold still."

name: Boggart Brute
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

name: Bogstomper
flavor_text:
"They are gentle herbivores, despite their size. Approach cautiously, and hum a tune to let them know you mean no harm."
—Vivien Reid

name: Bristling Boar
oracle_text: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text:
"Nicol Bolas destroyed my world. I owe it to Skalla to celebrate all life, no matter how dangerous."
—Vivien Reid

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "I decide what stands in my way."

name: Catalyst Elemental
oracle_text: Sacrifice Catalyst Elemental: Add {R}{R}.
flavor_text: As the hyperstormic generator crept past redline, a being emerged from the arc.

name: Cavalry Drillmaster
oracle_text: When Cavalry Drillmaster enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Centaur Courser
flavor_text:
"The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."
—Ramal, sage of Westgate

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Cinder Barrens
oracle_text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text:
"I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

name: Crash Through
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

name: Daggerback Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Its ventricles weep venom, and it consumes only poison.

name: Daybreak Chaplain
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "May the light shine through me to guide the lost."

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

name: Divination
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "The stars mark your destiny. May you accept the fate thus divulged."

name: Doomed Dissenter
oracle_text: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

name: Druid of the Cowl
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "The wild tangle of the Cowl provides sanctuary to life that watched the first buildings rise."

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"It hurts more if you think about it."
—Hooks, Cabal torturer

name: Dwarven Priest
oracle_text: When Dwarven Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text: "These storied halls are under my protection."

name: Dwindle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.
When enchanted creature blocks, destroy it. (The attacking creature remains blocked.)
flavor_text: The collection didn't have room to expand, so the wizard improvised a solution.

name: Electrify
oracle_text: Electrify deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: "Some hid from the storm. I embraced it and learned its name."

name: Elvish Rejuvenator
oracle_text: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Epicure of Blood
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "Fleshy, with just a hint of leather. A fine vintage."

name: Essence Scatter
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.
flavor_text: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

name: Explosive Apparatus
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Explosive Apparatus: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Souls are volatile things. When compressed and loaded into a handheld device, their destructive potential is quite impressive."
—Dierk, geistmage

name: Field Creeper
flavor_text: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.

name: Fire Elemental
flavor_text: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

name: Forsaken Sanctuary
oracle_text:
Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavor_text:
"Prayers will curdle on the tongue and be heard by rotting ears."
—Minaldra, the Vizag Atum

name: Foul Orchard
oracle_text:
Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavor_text: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.

name: Frilled Sea Serpent
oracle_text: {5}{U}{U}: Frilled Sea Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Reel it in. No, wait! Throw it back!"
—Gertrude, deep-sea angler

name: Gallant Cavalry
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Gallant Cavalry enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
flavor_text: "Our duty does not stop at our borders."

name: Gearsmith Guardian
oracle_text: Gearsmith Guardian gets +2/+0 as long as you control a blue creature.
flavor_text: Made in its creator's image, though slightly more clangy.

name: Gearsmith Prodigy
oracle_text: Gearsmith Prodigy gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.
flavor_text: Young artificers on Kaladesh let their imaginations run wild.

name: Ghostform
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "Picking locks is for beginners."

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"After everything I've survived, it's hard to be frightened by anything anymore."
—Vivien Reid

name: Goblin Instigator
oracle_text: When Goblin Instigator enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
flavor_text: "We can take 'em. You go first!"

name: Goblin Motivator
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: Small words stoke large flames.

name: Grasping Scoundrel
oracle_text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavor_text: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."

name: Greenwood Sentinel
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Within a mile of the woodland, you will feel her eyes upon you. Within its borders, you will feel her blade.

name: Havoc Devils
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: For devils, burning things is the highest form of comedy, diversion, and artistic expression.

name: Highland Game
oracle_text: When Highland Game dies, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Bring down a stag and fix its horns upon Arel's head. She hears the wisdom of our ancestors."
—Chianul, Who Whispers Twice

name: Highland Lake
oracle_text:
Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavor_text:
"A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah."
—Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab

name: Hired Blade
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text: "If you want them dead, buy some poison. If you want them to have the worst day of their life before dying, then let's talk price."

name: Hostile Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: The bellow of a minotaur always translates to "charge."

name: Infectious Horror
oracle_text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

name: Infernal Scarring
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavor_text: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants,... and they were barely a tenth of our number!"
—General Avitora

name: Invoke the Divine
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Let go of all that harms you. Cast your burdens into the darkness, and build for the faithful a house of light."
—*Song of All*, canto 1008

name: Kargan Dragonrider
oracle_text: As long as you control a Dragon, Kargan Dragonrider has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: "Only those who give the dragons the respect they deserve may bear our title."

name: Knight of the Tusk
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: "Horse? Who needs a horse?"

name: Knight's Pledge
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: "As long as my faith persists, so shall I."

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Catch!"

name: Lich's Caress
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: A lich must consume mortal souls to feed its eternal life.

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

name: Loxodon Line Breaker
flavor_text: Loxodons are firm in stature and spirit. No matter the odds, they are always first into battle.

name: Luminous Bonds
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."

name: Macabre Waltz
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Liliana is never one to follow someone else's lead.

name: Manalith
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unwittingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

name: Marauder's Axe
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: A sharp axe solves most problems.

name: Meandering River
oracle_text:
Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I feel the presence of the God-Pharaoh in the Second Sun, and I rise upon its rays."

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

name: Mist-Cloaked Herald
oracle_text: Mist-Cloaked Herald can't be blocked.
flavor_text: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines."
—Iveta, rooftop runner

name: Oakenform
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
flavor_text:
"When the beast cloaks itself in the mighty oak, what good is a bow? When the oak wraps itself around the snarling beast, what good is a hatchet?"
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

name: Omenspeaker
oracle_text: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

name: Onakke Ogre
flavor_text: The ogres you know are nothing like the Onakke. Possessing both intellect and industry, they had brute strength without being brutish.

name: Oreskos Swiftclaw
flavor_text: The leonin of Oreskos are quick to take offense—not because they are thin-skinned but because they are always ready for a fight.

name: Pegasus Courser
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Pegasus Courser attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: A pegasus chooses its rider, bearing the worthy into the clouds and tossing all others to the ground.

name: Pendulum of Patterns
oracle_text:
When Pendulum of Patterns enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Pendulum of Patterns: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Its elaborate designs reveal secrets of aether's flow.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Rabid Bite
oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"You should have seen the look on *both* their faces."
—Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper

name: Radiating Lightning
oracle_text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.
flavor_text: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

name: Revitalize
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A potion is no substitute for a skilled surgeon, but it will hold your bits in."
—Torricks, battlefield medic

name: Rhox Oracle
oracle_text: When Rhox Oracle enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "The further into the future I look, the less certain my vision. Even now, the middle distance is obscured by fire."

name: Root Snare
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: The only casualties were a snapped spear, a lost helmet, and some bruised egos.

name: Rustwing Falcon
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Native to wide prairies and scrublands, falcons occasionally roost in dragon skeletons.

name: Salvager of Secrets
oracle_text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The greatest treasure of the deep is an echo from above.

name: Scholar of Stars
oracle_text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.
flavor_text: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

name: Silverbeak Griffin
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: A pair of domesticated griffins escaped from captivity a century ago. Now the skies are filled with the songs of their descendants.

name: Skeleton Archer
oracle_text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance."
—Isareth the Awakener

name: Skymarch Bloodletter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

name: Skyscanner
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: The municipal senate makes extensive use of the thopters, mostly to gather dirt on rival senators.

name: Smelt
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: The creation of new weapons demands the destruction of others.

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.

name: Sovereign's Bite
oracle_text: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"You have given all to your kingdom, dear knight. Serenity shall be your prize."
—Queen Lian

name: Sparktongue Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

name: Star-Crowned Stag
oracle_text: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: White as starlight on snow, it appears only on the eve of the winter solstice.

name: Stone Quarry
oracle_text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: The bedrock has many gifts to give.

name: Strangling Spores
oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Imagine a thousand tiny mushrooms cropping up within your lungs.

name: Submerged Boneyard
oracle_text:
Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text:
"Long after the land has given up the last of its secrets, there will still be mysteries in the depths of the sea."
—Kiora

name: Sun Sentinel
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Just as the sun rises at dawn and the days lengthen in the summer, the Sun Empire has awakened after long years of quiet.

name: Sure Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: To survive imminent doom, it sometimes takes a foolhardy soul who acts first and fears later.

name: Take Vengeance
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: "Your death will be a balm, your passing a welcome revision, and all will sigh with peace to know of your demise."

name: Talons of Wildwood
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
{2}{G}: Return Talons of Wildwood from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Tattered Mummy
oracle_text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead who wander beyond the safety of the city of Naktamun crave only to spread their curse.

name: Thornhide Wolves
flavor_text:
"Halana grew brambles to create a barricade around our camp, hoping that it would keep the wolves out. That was a mistake for which we almost paid dearly."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Timber Gorge
oracle_text:
Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: Tazeem's embrace is harsh, but for those that call it home, nothing else will do.

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

name: Tolarian Scholar
flavor_text: The Tolarian Academies embrace a tradition of study and research while discouraging the kinds of experiments that ruined the original island of Tolaria.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

name: Tranquil Expanse
oracle_text:
Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: Beyond the chaos of Ghirapur lies a vibrant world where aether flows through nature.

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The sound of the trumpets lights a fire in the hearts of the bold and snuffs the courage of the cowardly.

name: Trusty Packbeast
oracle_text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Margaret has traveled with me to the end of the world and back."
—Hewen Frit, merchant

name: Two-Headed Zombie
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"Thread the torsos together with angel hair to ensure they will cooperate in battle."
—*The Stitcher's Tome*

name: Uncomfortable Chill
oracle_text:
Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The cold slowed their movements until only their panicked eyeballs swiveled beneath the ice.

name: Ursine Champion
oracle_text: {5}{G}: Ursine Champion gets +3/+3 and becomes a Bear Berserker until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: "Would you rather feel the edge of blade or the sharpness of my fangs?"

name: Vampire Neonate
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: One day, they may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, they possess nothing but thirst.

name: Viashino Pyromancer
oracle_text: When Viashino Pyromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "I trained with the Ghitu, and I respect the fire as they do."

name: Walking Corpse
flavor_text:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Wall of Mist
oracle_text: Defender
flavor_text: The seafloor is flecked with the bones of fools who dared to sail into the mist.

name: Wall of Vines
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

name: Waterknot
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.
